text: Walter de Souza Goulart (17 July 1912 - 13 November 1951), known as just Walter, was a Brazilian footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He played for Brazil national team at the 1938 FIFA World Cup finals, where they managed a third-place finish. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian association football goalkeepers
title: Walter (footballer, born 1912)
